class.name: DojoOption
class.description: This class represents a value that may or may not be present. It's the base class for specific optional types like [OptionU32] and [OptionU64].

method.name: get_value
method.description: Returns the contained value if it exists, otherwise [code]null[/code].

method.name: is_some
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the option contains a value ([code]Some[/code]), [code]false[/code] otherwise ([code]None[/code]).

method.name: set_value
method.description: Sets the value. If the value is [code]null[/code], it represents [code]None[/code].

method.name: to_json
method.description: Converts the option to a JSON-representable dictionary.
